translations: v．掩饰，假装：为了避免暴露真实情况或感受而采取的伪装行为。
· He was dissembling his true intentions.
他在掩饰他的真实意图。

sentences.sentence: She was a very honest person who was incapable of dissembling.
sentences.translation: 她是一个非常诚实的人，不会伪装。

sentences.sentence: He was accused of dissembling and deception of campaign funds.
sentences.translation: 他被指控掩饰和欺骗竞选经费。

sentences.sentence: On reading diplomats’ dissembling, people may be tempted to sneer.
sentences.translation: 读到外交官的虚虚假假时，人们也许将嗤之以鼻。
